import React,{useRef} from 'react' import './search-bar.css' import{ Col, Form,FormGroup } from "reactstrap"; const SearchBar = () => { const locationRef = useRef('') const tanggalRef = useRef('0') const groupRef = useRef('0') const searchHandler = ()=>{ const location = locationRef.current.value const tanggal = tanggalRef.current.value const group = groupRef.current.value if (location =='' || tanggal =='' || group ==''){ return alert('Harus diisi terlebih dahulu!'); } } return
Location
Tanggal
Jumlah Orang
} export default SearchBar
